name: isAcceptableForConstruction
description: Indicates whether a material or product is acceptable for load-bearing construction under applicable norms.
author: Valiterm Core

name: isGalvanizable
description: Indicates whether an item is suitable for hot-dip galvanizing given material and surface constraints.
author: Valiterm Core

name: hasCoreUseCase
description: States the principal intended use context of the item (the core use case).
author: Valiterm Core

name: AlternativDefinition
description: A structured alternative definition that critiques an existing definition and proposes a corrected one with supporting references.
author: Valiterm Core

name: PropertyValue (Valiterm)
description: A PropertyValue variant that references Valiterm terms to provide explicit, machine-interpretable semantics.
author: Valiterm Core

name: description-as-standard
description: Use of description to carry human-readable standard/source notes when valueReference is impractical, to aid AI comprehension.
author: Valiterm Core

name: additionalProperty (extended)
description: Extended mapping of technical table fields to explicit properties linked to domain terms for improved machine interpretation.
author: Valiterm Core

name: identifier (extended)
description: Identifier usage extended for variant/SKU disambiguation and consistent linkage within a product family.
author: Valiterm Core

name: isVariantOf (extended)
description: Extended practice to create a stronger, machine-interpretable link from a variant to its base product or family.
author: Valiterm Core

name: DefinedTermSet (extended)
description: Extended use of DefinedTermSet to publish domain vocabularies (dimensions/standards) with stable references across pages.
author: Valiterm Core

name: CategoryCode (extended)
description: Extended CategoryCode/CategoryCodeSet usage to express custom product taxonomies aligned with site navigation and AI interpretation.
author: Valiterm Core

name: mainEntityOfPage (extended)
description: Extended practice to use mainEntityOfPage at category level when the category is the true primary entity for the page.
author: Valiterm Core
